Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{3: 'Just as you turn around, a firm tug on your wrist sends you stumbling backward, completely off balance, before you can even take a step.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You were the one who invited me out, so why bolt upon seeing me?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You asked Vera out today for Valentine's Day as a token of thanks for all her help."}
{3: "Vera's smile was trouble spelled out, making you want to flee."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You invited me out of the blue, then darted away, and now, you're suddenly apologizing... Got something up your sleeve?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Absolutely not!', 3: '19'}
{2: '(Take a deep breath to calm down)', 3: '20'}
{2: "It wasn't just a spur-of-the-moment thing; it was a gesture of grati...", 3: '21'}
{3: 'Vera cuts you off abruptly before you can finish.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Today's some kind of festival, right? Which one exactly?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's Valentine's Day. Didn't you celebrate it last year?", 3: '24'}
{3: 'Vera pretends not to know.'}
{3: "With no other option under Vera's insistent gaze, you find yourself explaining the origins and customs of Valentine's Day to her."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So, it's a lovey-dovey festival, huh.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I find it curious. Why would the commandant specifically ask me out on this day?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is this a date?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'It is a date, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'It is a date, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera sighs impatiently.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You're thanking me for my past help by inviting me to this event and meeting here first. Isn't a date essentially a prearranged meeting?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I really don't know what you're stressing about.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera's annoyed expression seems legit. Are you overthinking?"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Sorry for the confusion earlier.', 3: '44'}
{2: "Yes, it's a date.", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So, you did want to ask me out!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "No wonder you've been acting so weird since we met, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So, you had these flirty thoughts all along.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Take a deep breath. Stay cool. Stay cool!)', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's amusing how you invite me on such a special day and then act like it's no big deal. Your contradictions are kind of cute.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Thanks to you, I'm feeling pretty happy now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "As a token of appreciation, I'll go along with this date.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But beware, being seen with an unpopular Construct like me might make you unpopular too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you ever find yourself unloved and homeless, you can come crying to me. With my big heart, I might even let you crash in my room.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'How nice, huh.', 3: '60'}
{2: "But don't worry, that's never going to happen.", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "After all, Commandant's quite the catch.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Let your guard down for a second, and some other Construct might snatch you away.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But whatever's in my grasp is mine.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera grips your hand a bit tighter.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm a bit manipulative, you see.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Since Commandant asked me out, you can't ditch me until I'm satisfied.", 4: '1'}
